title: Hide Player bottom control button during active session

requirements.summary: Conditionally remove the Player bottom control button from the DOM while a session is active (running or paused) and re-render it when the session ends.
acceptanceCriteria: When a breathing session is running, the selected button is not present in the DOM (not just visually hidden).
When a breathing session is paused, the selected button is not present in the DOM.
When the session ends (including auto-stop when the configured duration is reached), the selected button becomes visible again automatically without requiring any additional user action.
No other elements outside the selected XPath are changed as part of this request.

file_operations.description: Update only the bottom control button within the existing bottom controls container so it is rendered only when engine.state.isRunning is false; when engine.state.isRunning is true (including paused), render nothing in place of the button so it is removed from the DOM, and allow it to reappear automatically once the session transitions back to non-running (e.g., manual stop via navigation or auto-stop at target duration).
